      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(IEntity e,
                      java.util.ArrayList<IComponent> cl,
                      java.util.ArrayList<ISystem> sl)
        Add an entity and its associated components and systems to the managers.
        Parameters:
        e - the entity to add.
        cl - a list of components to add.
        sl - a list of systems to add.

      • removeEntity

        public boolean removeEntity(int id)
        Remove an entity, and all of its components and systems.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the entity to remove.
        Returns:
        true if successfully removed.

      • flagEntityForRemoval

        public void flagEntityForRemoval(int id)
        flag an entity for removal at the end of the current update cycle.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the entity to remove.

      • update

        public void update()
        Called each tick. This calls the update method for each syst_em in the order defined, then dispatches all events created during this tick cycle.
